en-US.languages_collection_comment: Collection that stores the language options
en-US.languages_primary_comment: Field that holds the language primary key on the languages collection
en-US.languages_name_comment: Field that holds the language's name on the languages collection
en-US.translation_language_comment: The field that stores the language primary key in the related translations collection
en-US.translation_no_languages: There are no languages in the languages collection
en-US.default_language_comment: Add the primary key of the item in the languages collection to use as the default language
